en_US: This does not have a mob.
The most terrifying creature in the world, this fierce boss brings terror into anyone in its path.
The guardian of the underground is no joke, prepare to be obliterated.
It's said in order to save his kids the Boarfather climbed its way out from hell. It is so feared that no civilisation can come close to it.
In control of legions of skeletons, the Skeleton King is a force to be reckoned with. Its mighty sword will send a shiver down your spine.
The God of the Sky and Thunder; King of the Gods on Mount Olympus; Zeus.
An unsightly foe for those who have to get in its path, they fiercely withold the ability to grow pumpkins.
An advanced machine, with powerful lasers that even work underwater; the guardian of the water won't take kindly to you treading on its territory.
A possessed beast of unknown origins, believed to be associated with the mysterious activities in the Forests.

A beast created accidentally by a witch experimenting on a zombie, currently it roams aimlessly, but some fear what will happen if it gets out of control. The giant is so large it can be seen from outerspace.
Many slimes have fused to form this huge slime, it loves to jump onto buildings smashing them, however luckily it prefers staying underground.
A holy creature that lives in the paradise of the clouds.
Zeus's minions help guard the skies against any threats.
A sentient solar flare that travelled from the Sun all the way to Earth just to bring destruction.
An ancient monster that guards the skies from intruders.
After the original design of the Elite Sentry, a cheaper solution was needed, thus the Nautical Sentry.
A heavily damaged sentry, something truly massive must have attacked it. It's very glitchy in its current state.
An invasive species of plants believed to have originated in the jungle, aurea have evolved to be able to fly.
An invasive species of plants believed to have originated in the jungle, adustus have evolved to be able to take on fierce pyroclast mobs.
An invasive species of plants believed to have originated in the jungle, caverna have evolved the defense needed to withstand cave-ins.
An invasive species of plants believed to have originated in the jungle, glacio have evolved the bulk needed to survive harsh winters.
An invasive species of plants believed to have originated in the jungle, aquamaris have evolved to the fast-paced aquatic lifestyle.
An invasive species of plants believed to have originated in the jungle, hedera have evolved to attack any threats with a fierce explosion.
This spirit has been judged, and now it will judge you. It loves to snipe things from afar with fire.
Impressive machines that utilise the powers of electomagnetism to fly, incinerators will spray fire at you.
Skeletons round these parts got burnt up.
The strongest Karkothians, having lost lots of blood to get here, now exude power and command respect, bow down to the rulers of the pyroclast!
Boars not in their prime are weak, and are only found where they can be protected. They still pack a punch though.
A common animal in pyroclast, although strong to us they are but food to the Karkothians.
Young boars are weak, and are only found where they can be protected. They still pack a punch though.
They do the dirty work for the brutes, they aren't afraid to risk their lives if it gives them a shot at becoming a brute themselves.
Scouts sent from the bastions to monitor areas and hunt for their prized bacon.
The Witches have caused chaos onto local populations for millenia.

Most cavern ghouls go all their life without seeing a single other living creature besides for their own birth. Lets just say their curiosity towards seeing their first living creature won't be a friendly one.
These stone creatures are very territorial, you will regret coming near.
They may be a scavenger but they will eat you alive too. Their insane dive speeds are good for both stealing things and for getting lunch.
They will come after you. We aren't too sure where they come from, just that they hate us. They teleport using magic.
Even after warlocks die they will come after you.
The Skeleton Horseman terrorises those in its path.
Ready to mine, but can pack a punch too. Won't take kindly to intruders in their mine, and will viciously defend the capital.
Always attacks you when you least expect it, a special unit ordered personally by the Skeleton King.
What if a skeleton could move as fast as a wolf?
These elite archers will pierce through enemy lines.
Basic grunts for the Skeleton King.
I bet they feel a chill in their spine.
Always shoots at you when you least expect it.
Did you ever just think slimes weren't annoying enough?
It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a flying slime?
Little gooey things, they look harmless, and they mostly are.
Rulers of the jungle, no one can stop them.
This annoying critter is sure to get in your way.
Some Melons got tired of being farmed. They won't take kindly to you.
Many have heard of the Venus Fly Trap, but have you ever heard of the Venus Human Trap?
The deadliest animals on the planet kill 75 million...sharks a year.
Alchemists don't like to battle, but if they do you better be careful. Their dark magic clones will shoot at you from all sides.
These strong wielders of dark magic will make you regret coming near, they will send vengeful spirits your way.
These pesky creatures are hard to hit, they are an embodiment of dark magic, and will hunt you down.
Part of a mysterious group in the woods. They are sure to bring some pain.
Part of a mysterious group in the woods. They appear to have gotten lost and frozen, and they will take that out on any passersby.
Part of a mysterious group in the woods. They don't need to stop meditating to kill you.
Honestly don't know that much about sphinxes.
Imagine a zombie, but like wrapped in cloth, and in the desert, and also they used to be rich.
Careful walking through sand, you never know.
These poor folk were unable to leave the sea once they entered.
Hordes of zombies roam the island, this basic mob is easily overcome.
